review.title: “Good place to start your career”
review.pros: Pros – -Management is easy to talk to-Small family culture-Good hours-Everyone is respectful and treats others that way
review.cons: Cons – -Projects vary from small to large-Not all projects advertising
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Sometimes top management needs to be refreshed

review.title: “Positive”
review.pros: Pros – interesting mix of clients and opportunities to work with multiple types of media, they really try to create an open culture where all ideas can be presented.
review.cons: Cons – senior management was not well aligned so messages to staff differed by department. There is difficulty is selling new ideas, the account team needs t be more connected to the creative in order to be able to support and sell creative.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Make sure your senior staff is really engaged and offer them more opportunities to present and own accounts. Strategy in particular needs to support their staff more and let them own accounts.
